spec_data.Name: perl-Future
spec_data.Description:
A Future object represents an operation that is currently in progress, or
has recently completed. It can be used in a variety of ways to manage the
flow of control, and data, through an asynchronous program.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 11:50:22 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perl object system to represent an operation awaiting completion
